| `collapsed`    | `collapsed`     | Collapsed state | `boolean`                                                        | `false`     |
| `collapsible`  | `collapsible`   | Collapsible     | `boolean`                                                        | `false`     |
| `icon`         | `icon`          | Icon to show    | `string \| undefined`                                            | `undefined` |
| `variant`      | `variant`       | Callout variant | `"error" \| "info" \| "note" \| "success" \| "tip" \| "warning"` | `'info'`    |
